颭字的基本解释

颭
zhǎn
见“飐”。

颭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］
［《廣韻》占琰切，上琰，章。］
“飐1”的繁体字。
(1)风吹物使颤动摇曳。
(2)颤动；摇动。
(3)能人。宋元时指相扑（摔跤）艺人。

颭字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　颭； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1412第06
【廣韻】占琰切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】職琰切，?音拈。【廣韻】風吹落水。【說文】風吹浪動也。【柳宗元詩】驚風亂颭芙蓉水。【劉歆·遂初賦】猋風盲其飄忽兮。迴颭颭其冷冷。【正字通】凡風動物，與物受風搖曳者，皆謂之颭。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
飐
zhǎn
See "飐".
飐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎn］
["Guangyun" Zhanyan cut, Shangyan, chapter. ]
Traditional characters for "飐1".
(1) The wind blows the object to shake and sway.
(2) Shaking; shaking.
(3) The capable person. Song and Yuan Dynasty refers to sumo (wrestling) entertainers.
飐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　飐; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1412 Page 06
[Guangyun] Zhanyan cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Professional Yan cut,? Sound twist. [Guangyun] The wind blows into the water. [Said the text] The wind and waves are also moving. [Liu Zongyuan Poems] Frightening wind and chaotic lotus water. [Liu Xin·Suichu Fu] The wind is blind and erratic. Back to the fate of its cold. 【Zhengzitong】All animals in the wind, and those who are swayed by the wind, are all called 飐.
